title: "LA County Office of the Assessor to discuss machine learning in Oct. 21 webinar"
excerpt: "Officials from the LA County Assessor’s office employed machine learning and artificial intelligence to calculate if a home sales price was reasonable. By using ten years’ worth of data- some 300,000 records- assessors cut in half the need for in-person appraisals and were able to effectively calculate the value of some 2."
